      • getEntries

        public List<LedgerEntry> getEntries(String currency,
                                    String dateStart,
                                    String dateEnd)
                             throws BitPayException,
                                    LedgerQueryException
        Retrieve a list of ledgers entries by currency and date range using the merchant facade.
        Parameters:
        currency - The three digit currency string for the ledger to retrieve.
        dateStart - The first date for the query filter.
        dateEnd - The last date for the query filter.
        Returns:
        A list of Ledger entries.
        Throws:
        BitPayException - BitPayException class
        LedgerQueryException - LedgerQueryException class

      • getLedgers

        public List<Ledger> getLedgers()
                        throws BitPayException,
                               LedgerQueryException
        Ledgers are records of money movement. Retrieve a list of ledgers using the merchant facade.
        Returns:
        A list of Ledger objects populated with the currency and current balance of each one.
        Throws:
        BitPayException - BitPayException class
        LedgerQueryException - LedgerQueryException class
